data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: A cataclysmic, fiery red mana eruption tears through the core of a floating volcanic island-world, sending molten energy and shattered rock exploding into the star-filled cosmic nebula-sea. The raw, overwhelming power illuminates the surrounding bioluminescent coral nebulae, hinting at both destructive force and dangerous, reckless mana extraction.
Artist Credit: Inspired by Ryan Pancoast

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
